Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.17681018]HSV-1:inhibition of virus infection in NP-2/CD4/CCR5 cells(IC50=7.3 ÂµM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Mechanism of action: The anti-HSV1 activity of apoEdp involves inhibition of virus particle attachment to cells, with this likely being related to the derivation of this peptide from the apoE HSPG/LDLR binding region.
